spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall footprint and circulation do not match the long, linear 2D plan. The 3D model appears more compact and re-arranged, with corridor/room placements deviating from the central Living & Dining + two side wings layout. Balcony locations shown in plan (central living balcony and master bedroom balcony) are not clearly represented in the 3D. Multiple toilet locations shown in the 2D plan are not consistently present/placed in the 3D. Window count/positions along the exterior walls are significantly reduced/shifted versus plan. Room proportions (especially the long living/dining span and the right-side kitchen/utility band) are not preserved.

structural_fidelity.notes: Adjacency relationships diverge: in the plan, Kitchen+Utility are grouped on the right with a passage connection to Living/Dining, while the 3D does not clearly maintain this banded right-side service zone. Several wet areas (toilets/powder) shown in plan appear missing or merged in the 3D. Balconies appear missing or not structurally formed as per plan. Some internal partitions/door openings do not align with the expected doorway count/locations from the 2D plan. No strong evidence of consistent wall-thickness logic relative to the plan’s partition hierarchy.

furniture_mapping.notes: Beds/sofas/tables are present but cannot be mapped reliably to the exact rooms and orientations from the 2D layout due to plan-to-model room reconfiguration. Furniture scale looks broadly plausible, but because several rooms are proportionally distorted, furniture-to-room fit is not faithful to the 2D dimensions.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Isometric view is generally correct and readable. Lighting is soft and acceptable, with minimal harsh artifacts. Geometry is mostly clean, but the model lacks clear definition for key architectural features (balconies, openings) and appears simplified, reducing visual clarity for verification. Not orthographic-accurate to the plan due to re-proportioned massing.

detected_errors.description: Central Living & Dining balcony (top-center in 2D plan) not clearly present in 3D render.
Master bedroom balcony (left side in 2D plan) not clearly present/formed in 3D render.
Utility room (adjacent to kitchen in 2D plan) appears missing or not distinctly modeled in 3D.
Powder toilet (P.TOILET in 2D plan near entrance/passage) appears missing or not identifiable in 3D.
Kitchen location/adjacency to Living & Dining via the right-side wide passage does not clearly match the 2D plan arrangement.
Toilet placements/count do not match the multiple toilets shown in the 2D plan (several appear merged, shifted, or absent).
Door placement/orientation for bedroom and toilet entries does not consistently follow the 2D door swing locations (openings appear relocated along different wall segments).
Window placement and count along exterior walls are inconsistent with the 2D plan; several expected windows/openings are missing or repositioned.
Overall proportions distorted: 2D plan is a long horizontal bar-like layout; 3D render appears more compact with altered wing lengths and room sizes.
Hall/circulation spaces in the 3D appear to introduce an extra/altered corridor configuration not supported by the 2D plan.
